pageProduct.name: Avene DermAbsolu Youth Eye Cream 15ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene DermAbsolu Youth Eye Cream helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing thanks to the unique combination of active ingredients:
- Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
- SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face
- Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin
This combination guarantees unprecedented benefits; visibly lifting, firming and restoring comfort to the skin.

The cooling metal applicator tip glides over the delicate skin, gently massaging and decongesting the eye contour. Puffiness, dark circles and appearance of wrinkles are reduced leaving the eye contour area smoothed and visibly lifted. Specially developed for local application, the cream combines a high concentration of non-drying fixing agents (waxes) and an extensive hydra-nourishing phase.

PROVEN EFFICACY skin is toned by 95% after 4 weeks, and by 91% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY to visibly combat the signs of ageing by 86% after 4 weeks, and 91% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY to smooth the eye contour by 91% after 4 weeks, and 92% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY to reduce puffiness around the eyes by 78% after 5 days, 81% after 4 weeks, 87% after 8 weeks**

PROVEN EFFICACY to reduce dark circles around the eyes by 71% after 5 days, 82% after 4 weeks, 85% after 8 weeks***
*% of satisfaction – Consumer in use test after 1 and 2 months, applied once daily on 84 subjects

**% of satisfaction – Consumer in use test after 5 days, 1 month and 2 months, applied once daily on 37 subjects

***% of satisfaction – Consumer in use test after 5 days, 1 month and 2 months, applied once daily on 61 subjects

****Measurement of the Hydration Index on 20 subjects with dehydrated skin, after 1 application on the forearm

Common Uses

Helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing

Ingredients

  • Avene Thermal Spring Water: Soothing and anti-irritating
  • Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
  • SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face 
  • Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin

Directions

Cooling metallic massage applicator, that gently relieves congestion around the eye area.
Apply in the morning and/or evening, gently gliding the contoured applicator back and forth along the eye contour and brow bone. Use finger to smooth in any excess until absorbed.
